actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.
actions.name: Burning Slash

actions.desc: The execrable shrub releases a billowing cloud of smoke in a 10-foot-radius that lasts for 1 minute and moves with the shrub. The area affected by the smoke is heavily obscured.
actions.name: Smolder (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.desc: Whenever a creature is reduced to 0 hp within 60 feet of the execrable shrub, the shrub regains 5 (1d10) hp.
special_abilities.name: Healed by Blood

special_abilities.desc: The execrable shrub knows if a creature within 60 feet of it is evil-aligned or not.
special_abilities.name: Like Calls to Like

special_abilities.desc: Using telepathy, the execrable shrub can magically communicate with any other evil-aligned creature within 100 feet of it. This communication is primarily through images and emotions rather than actual words.
special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
